title: Cucumber Margarita

ingredients.content: 210 g cucumber, peeled, deseeded, cut in pieces, plus extra sticks for garnish
3 limes, peeled, with white pith removed and deseeded
1 - 2 Tbsp fine sea salt, to taste, for serving

preparations.content: Place cucumber, Tequila, orange liqueur, sugar and limes in mixing bowl then blend <b>30 sec/speed 8<b>.
Add ice cubes and blend again <b>1 min/speed 10<b>. Serve in salt rimmed cocktail glasses (see tip) and garnish with cucumber sticks.

hintsAndTricks: Serve your cocktail glass with a salt rim. Before adding cocktail, rub the glass rim with a lime wedge to wet, then twist rim in 1-2 Tbsp salt in a saucer.
